content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI used the 'get_hyperlinks' command to retrieve hyperlinks from the New York Times website, but it returned too much output and I was warned not to execute it again with the same arguments. Instead, I used the 'browse_website' command to search for a hyperlink to an article about the US debt ceiling. The website did not have any mention or hyperlink to such an article, but it did provide links to the Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy, and Site Map, among others."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.google.com/", "question": "Can you search for an article about the US debt ceiling?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Yes, you can search for an article about the US debt ceiling using Google. The text also provides information about Google's services, privacy policy, and options to personalize or reject personalized content and ads based on user activity and location. \n \n Links: ['zde (https://www.google.com/?output=search&gbv=1&sei=t6lWZO3AF5aukdUPjduCyAU)', 'Gmail (https://mail.google.com/mail/&ogbl)', 'Obrázky (https://www.google.cz/imghp?hl=cs&ogbl)', ' (https://www.google.cz/intl/cs/about/products)', 'Přihlásit (https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin?hl=cs&passive=true&continue=https://www.google.com/&ec=GAZAmgQ)']"}]
"""
